title: Full-stack Prompt Engineer Intern (Di An, Binh Duong)
descriptionText:
*Job Title:* Intern Prompt Engineer (nocode/lowcode)

*Location:* Di An, Binh Duong

*Type:* Internship (Full-Time)

*Duration:* 3 months _(This internship includes a clear growth path toward a full-time role based on performance, initiative, and team fit)_

*Working hours:* Monday to Friday (9:00 am to 6:00 pm)

========================================================

*Job Description:*

We are looking for a motivated Intern Prompt Engineer to join our team and support low-code development projects using AI tools like Windsurf. This role is ideal for candidates interested in prompt engineering, AI-assisted coding, and automation. You’ll work closely with developers to build workflows, refine prompts, and ensure quality in AI-generated code.

*Key Responsibilities:*

- Build and manage AI-powered workflows using Windsurf and low-code tools.

- Write, test, and refine prompts to improve the quality and accuracy of AI-generated code.

- Review, debug, and validate AI outputs using your foundational knowledge of coding.

- Work with the development team to improve existing workflows and implement new solutions.

- Document prompt strategies, code quality issues, and best practices for internal reference.

*Requirements:*

- Proficiency in TypeScript, NodeJS, ReactJS, PostgreSQL, NextJS, and NestJS.

- Basic proficiency in HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Python or any programming languages.

- Interest or experience in prompt engineering or AI-assisted coding.

- Familiarity with low-code platforms (Windsurf experience is a plus).

- Able to communicate in English (spoken and written).

- Analytical thinking with strong attention to detail.

- Eagerness to learn and contribute in a fast-paced, AI-focused team environment.

*Preferred:*

- Experience using developer tools like GitHub and VS Code.

- Exposure to AI tools like ChatGPT, GitHub Copilot, etc.

- Good communication and collaboration skills.

*Growth Path:*

Successful interns will be considered for a full-time *Prompt Engineer (Low-code)* role upon completion of the internship, based on demonstrated performance, growth, and team collaboration.

Job Types: Full-time, Internship
